item.title: Global Day of Code Retreat 2014
item.description: One month ago (on November 15th) I facilitated my first Global Day of Code Retreat at eBay Enterprise International and had such a blast. Link to the event (Spanish) Some thoughts After a month of thinking about it, here are some thoughts: This year’s GDCR was quite different that last one’s: It’s OK: do not strive for repeating the same each year Heat map (in several dimensions): TDD x language
